Case Study: Volkswagen Group

Platform Sprint

We were hired as a task force for an extended mission-critical situation to conceptualize and build an application for the IAA Preview Night, invite-only event in 4 weeks.

Learn more

Building a Global Mobile Newsroom in 4 Weeks

Key Challenges

  • Conceptualize and build a state-of-the-art app in 4 weeks.
  • Multi-platform project: iOS, Android & Web.
  • Provide ongoing value to stakeholders way beyond the IAA event.

Feature Scope

Working closely with key Volkswagen Group stakeholders, we conceptualized the application prioritising key user and strategic features for the tight deadline.

  • Volkswagen Group mobile newsroom
  • Stories, news, social and media updates
  • Download and social sharing
  • Comprehensive event guide for multiple events with e-ticket
  • Volkswagen Group media address book
  • Admin web content management system
  • Available on iOS and Android

Startup Pragmatism

We iteratively conceptialized, designed, built and tested the application successfully, bringing it to a level much greater than the average MVP in time for the event. The app now serves as the Volkswagen Group Newsroom, media address book and events guide for all future Group events.

Get in Touch

If you have a mission critical situation that you need support with, or would like to learn more about our services, please reach out. We look forward to hearing from you.
